question: 医大
sourceMnemonic: You've seen <ja>大学</ja> to mean "college." So take the <ja>大</ja> and put it with <kanji>medicine</kanji> to create "medicine college", or <vocabulary>medical university</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>大</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Your local <vocabulary>medical university</vocabulary> really prides itself on its <reading>ea</reading>gle <reading>dye</reading> (<ja>いだい</ja>). It's the only dye in the world made straight out of eagles. A bit strange for a medical university, but impressive nonetheless!
